moves.1. e4 e5 2. f4: Beasley opens with the King's Gambit, a risky but exciting line.
moves.2... Bc5: Lam responds with an aggressive move, focusing on Beasley's weakened KB2 square.
moves.3. Ne2: Beasley develops his KN -- to the wrong square. 3 N-KB3 is the proper move. He wanted to guard his KBP, but...
moves.4. Nbc3: Well, it's development of a sort.
moves.4... Bg4: Lam pins the KN, preparing for her next move.
moves.5. h3: Beasley's position was already deteriorating, but this makes matters disastrous.
moves.5... Bf3: The Bishop should NOT be captured.
moves.6. gxf3: Oops. Now the game ends quickly.
moves.6... Qh4+: Lam has been waiting to play this devasting move until it can cause maximum damage.
moves.7... Qxg3+ 8. Ke2 exf4 9. a3: Preparing to drive the Bishop with P-N4.
